secureKeys.title: Secure secret key
secureKeys.text:
The Public Key can be safely shared – it's like an account number.

The Secret Key is the access to your account. Treat it like a password:
• NEVER store it on cloud services, emails, or insecure notes
• Write it down on paper or use a hardware wallet
• Create multiple backups and store them in secure, separate locations
• If the Secret Key is lost, access to the account is irrevocably lost

multisigSection.title: Multisig
multisigSection.text:
With multisig, you can define multiple signers for your account. Transactions will then require signatures from multiple z. B. 2 von 3.

Advantages:
• Increased ein kompromittierter Key reicht nicht
• Shared z. B. Firmen, Partnerschaften
• mehrere Backups bei verschiedenen Personen recovery

WARNING: Test multisig on the testnet first before using it on the mainnet! Incorrect configuration can lead to losing access to the account.
